channel.title: Max Players
channel.description:
Im just wondering out of pure curiosity. How many players can an average server handle, I see people constantly
OMFGG!!!1!!1!11 31 PEOPLE.
Well this was the average amount of characters on my server before it was shut down for good.
[IMG]http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t277/HLDSCZ/untitled.jpg[/img]
I believe the max I had on my server was 81 ? - I just want to know the highest amount of players you've seen on other servers.

@Zenzie wrote:

It matters how many RAM you got like 512Mb cant handle around 20
